name: Ana Current Tasks - Auto-Populate
description: When a lead enters 'Replied - Awaiting Ana' status, automatically populate the 'Current Tasks' column with contextual reply options based on the Superlative Type (what Jennica originally congratulated them on).
purpose: Gives Ana instant access to relevant response templates without referencing external docs. Suggestions appear right in the lead record.

flow.note: Get full item details including Superlative Type

setup_instructions.step_2: Replace YOUR_BOARD_ID with your actual Monday board ID
setup_instructions.step_3: Get column ID for 'Current Tasks' (long text) and 'Superlative Type' (dropdown)
setup_instructions.step_4: Update column IDs in the scenario if different from 'current_tasks' and 'superlative_type'
setup_instructions.step_6: Test: Create a lead with Superlative Type = 'New Listing', change status to 'Replied - Awaiting Ana'
setup_instructions.step_7: Verify Current Tasks column populates with New Listing options

customization_notes.updating_responses: To change the suggested responses, edit the 'value' field in each router branch. Keep the JSON format with escaped newlines (\n).
customization_notes.adding_superlative_types: Add a new router branch with the appropriate filter and response text.
customization_notes.seasonal_updates: The responses reference 'summer biz' - update seasonally if desired (e.g., 'holiday season', 'spring market').
